snippet: A gunman opened fire at a psychiatric hospital in Pittsburgh, killing one person and wounding seven, including a police officer, officials said. The gunman was also said to have died.
abstract: Gunman opens fire in the lobby of a psychiatric hospital in Pittsburgh, killing one person and wounding seven, including a police officer; gunman, who remains unidentified, is also killed.
lead_paragraph: A gunman opened fire at a psychiatric hospital in Pittsburgh, killing one person and wounding seven, including a police officer, officials said. The gunman was also said to have died.

headline.main: 2 Die and 7 Are Wounded in a Shooting in Pittsburgh
headline.print_headline: 2 Die and 7 Are Wounded In a Shooting in Pittsburgh
